name: Dusty Ride
description:
A rail-shooter set on a dusty planet.  Shoot the enemies and get the best high score!

The forward motion and path are already pre-determined, so you just need to worry about avoiding obstacles horizontally and vertically.

Use AD keys to move left and right. Use WS keys to move up and down. Use Left Click for shooting.

Solo project - made in December, 2021.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
